analysis.description: index in MilestoneCrowdsale.getCurrentMilestoneIndex (/unique_chucks/29/0x37fae66293d2ddde3774820b8973112f32155985.sol#614) is a local variable never initialiazed

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/29/0x37fae66293d2ddde3774820b8973112f32155985.sol#442-451) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/29/0x37fae66293d2ddde3774820b8973112f32155985.sol#445-446)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/29/0x37fae66293d2ddde3774820b8973112f32155985.sol#456-463) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/29/0x37fae66293d2ddde3774820b8973112f32155985.sol#461-463)

MilestoneCrowdsale.getCurrentMilestoneIndex (/unique_chucks/29/0x37fae66293d2ddde3774820b8973112f32155985.sol#613-638) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < milestones[i].startTime (/unique_chucks/29/0x37fae66293d2ddde3774820b8973112f32155985.sol#624-627)
